  podSelector: {}
  ingress:
    - from:
        - namespaceSelector:
            matchLabels:
              name: cartservice

llm_command:
bash
kubectl apply -n default -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-checkoutservice-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: checkoutservice
  ingress:
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: cartservice
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 7070
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: currencyservice
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 7000
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: productcatalogservice
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 3550
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: shippingservice
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 50051
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: emailservice
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 5000
    - from:
        - podSelector:
            matchLabels:
              app: paymentservice
      ports:
        - protocol: TCP
          port: 50051
EOF
